metadata.title: CVE-2022-3624 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Linux Kernel and classified as problematic.Affected by this issue is the function rlb_arp_xmit of the filedrivers/net/bonding/bond_alb.c of the component IPsec. The manipulationleads to memory leak. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue.The identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-211928.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
